title: Exponential and Logarithmic - Rewriting and Solving - Part A

content.question: Part A The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>g</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>h</mi> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mn>7</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mo>⋅</mo> <msup> <mn>7</mn> <mn>4</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mn>7</mn> <mn>6</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4393@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4364@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1A@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup> <mn>7</mn> <mi>c</mi> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DF6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>c</mi> </math> is a constant. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46AF@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>a</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>b</mi> </math> are constants.

(i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1A@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup> <mn>7</mn> <mi>c</mi> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DF6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>c</mi> </math> is a constant. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the form <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46AF@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>a</mi> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>b</mi> </math> are constants.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
